name: Bee Gone
description:
This game was a collaborative effort between rockfactgames and myself. Be sure to check out his itch.io page as well for some other fun free games!

Bee Gone is a 2D flight-based platforming game where you play as a lone bumblebee trying to return to the safety of his hive. Collect coins to preserve your flight energy and weave your way around any obstacles that might stand in your way!

  • Length: 30 minutes - 3 hours
    • 15 levels total
  • Controllers are supported 
    • Tested with PS4 and Xbox 360/One controllers
  • Development time: ~1.5 months

Warning: This game is intended to be somewhat difficult at points. If you are not experienced with 2D retro platformers, you may have a tough time completing it.

All comments and criticisms are greatly appreciated. Thank you for your support!

Cover image by levendice: https://www.fiverr.com/levendice
